title: Research Areas – Google Research
content: From conducting fundamental research to influencing product development, our research teams have the opportunity to impact technology used by billions of people every day. Our teams aspire to make discoveries that impact everyone, and core to our approach is sharing our research and tools to fuel progress in the field.  Our researchers publish regularly in academic journals, release projects as open source, and apply research to Google products. Learn more about our research philosophy and principles. Our teams advance the state of the art through research, systems engineering, and collaboration across Google.
